TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewPageEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页导航按钮 (`CommandName` 控件中 ) 属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 还可以设置 `CommandArgument` 页导航按钮的属性，以指定要执行的分页操作的类型。You can also set the `CommandArgument` property of a pager button to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出了支持的操作。The following table lists the supported operations. |CommandArgument 值CommandArgument value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |一个"Next"|导航到下一页。Navigates to the next page.| |处"Prev"|导航到上一页。Navigates to the previous page.| |1"First"|导航至第一页。Navigates to the first page.| |时间"Last"|导航至最后一页。Navigates to the last page.| |一个整数值An integer value|定位到指定的页。Navigates to the specified page.| 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消分页操作。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中 。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定用户所选择的页的索引，并指示是否应取消分页操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate whether the paging operation should be canceled. 若要确定用户选择的页的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消分页操作，请将 对象的属性设置 为 `true` 。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理方法的对象，以便在 用户尝试 在控件处于编辑模式时导航到其他页时取消分页操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to cancel a paging operation when the user attempts to navigate to another page while the control is in edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例中的控件包含一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。The control in this example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`newPageIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `newPageIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的新页的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the new page to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的新页的索引。

span.span: The index of the new page to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 事件发生在 控件执行分页操作之前发生，因此 控件的属性包含以前显示的页的索引，不能用于确定用户选择的页的索引。Because the event occurs before the control performs the paging operation, the property of the control contains the index of the previously displayed page and cannot be used to determine the index of the page selected by the user. 使用 属性来确定页索引。Use the property to determine the page index. 你还可以使用此属性，通过将用户设置为另一个值来以编程方式覆盖用户选择的页索引。You can also use this property to programmatically override the page index selected by the user by setting it to another value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定用户选择的页的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
